alert.note: Alert for Camden; Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 19 at 12:34PM EDT until June 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 339 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA CLAY DUVAL FLAGLER NASSAU PUTNAM ST. JOHNS IN NORTHERN FLORIDA ALACHUA BRADFORD GILCHRIST IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA CAMDEN GLYNN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ANASTASIA, ARLINGTON, BAKERSVILLE, BELLAIR, BOSTWICK, CARRAWAY, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORS INLET, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, DURBIN, FERNANDINA BEACH, FRUIT COVE, GAINESVILLE, GAINESVILLE AIRPORT, GLYNN HAVEN, HILLIARD, JACKSONVILLE, JEKYLL ISLAND, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKESIDE, MIDDLEBURG, NEW RIVER, NEWNANS LAKE, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, ORANGE PARK, ORTEGA, PALATKA, PALM COAST, PALM VALLEY, PONTE VEDRA BEACH, RATLIFF, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. SIMONS, STARKE, SWITZERLAND, THALMANN, TRENTON, AND YULEE.
